Name: Reticent Retribution
About the game: Reticent Retribution is a top down twin stick shooter. You must blast wave after wave of space enemies to progress. You can use the keyboard and a controller. 720p 60fps. Press 'esc' to quit, 'h' for help. The play area is one screen with no scrolling. You have 8 way movement and 8 way aiming. You have a gun. There are three enemy types. There are random maps with terrain to block movement. If you are attacked by an enemy you will not beat the level. There is no sound.
